member.name: T:RobusT2ScaleExternalFIS.Robust2Scale2
member.summary:
The Robust2Scale2 class provides a CLS compliant, MWArray interface to the MATLAB functions contained in the files:
C:\Users\pooyanjam\Source\Repos\pooyan-amir\RL-Q\Controllers\RobusT2Scale\RobusT2Sca lesg.m
deployprint.m
printdlg.m

member.name: M:RobusT2ScaleExternalFIS.Robust2Scale2.RobusT2Scalesg
member.summary: Provides a single output, 0-input MWArrayinterface to the RobusT2Scalesg MATLAB function.
member.remarks: M-Documentation: ------------------------------------------------------------------------ Authors: Pooyan Jamshidi (pooyan.jamshidi@gmail.com) The scripts implements the sugeno fuzzy controller and produce the output which is the scaling action for horizontal elasticity. x1: workload (should be normalized in [0 100]) x2: response time (should be normalized in [0 100]) scalingaction: [-2 +2], this determines the change in the number of resources ------------------------------------------------------------------------
member.returns: An MWArray containing the first output argument.

member.remarks: M-Documentation: ------------------------------------------------------------------------ Authors: Pooyan Jamshidi (pooyan.jamshidi@gmail.com) The scripts implements the sugeno fuzzy controller and produce the output which is the scaling action for horizontal elasticity. x1: workload (should be normalized in [0 100]) x2: response time (should be normalized in [0 100]) scalingaction: [-2 +2], this determines the change in the number of resources ------------------------------------------------------------------------
member.returns: An MWArray containing the first output argument.

member.name: M:RobusT2ScaleExternalFIS.Robust2Scale2.RobusT2Scalesg(System.Int32,MathWorks.MATLAB.NET.Arrays.MWArray[]@,MathWorks.MATLAB.NET.Arrays.MWArray[])
member.summary: Provides an interface for the RobusT2Scalesg function in which the input and output arguments are specified as an array of MWArrays.
member.remarks: This method will allocate and return by reference the output argument array. M-Documentation: ------------------------------------------------------------------------ Authors: Pooyan Jamshidi (pooyan.jamshidi@gmail.com) The scripts implements the sugeno fuzzy controller and produce the output which is the scaling action for horizontal elasticity. x1: workload (should be normalized in [0 100]) x2: response time (should be normalized in [0 100]) scalingaction: [-2 +2], this determines the change in the number of resources ------------------------------------------------------------------------
member.param: The number of output arguments to return

member.name: M:RobusT2ScaleExternalFIS.Robust2Scale2.WaitForFiguresToDie
member.summary: This method will cause a MATLAB figure window to behave as a modal dialog box. The method will not return until all the figure windows associated with this component have been closed.
member.remarks: An application should only call this method when required to keep the MATLAB figure window from disappearing. Other techniques, such as calling Console.ReadLine() from the application should be considered where possible.
